description: The 51-year-old is accused of loosening bolts on a railway track just before a bridge outside Frankfurt.
title: German police arrest man over high-speed rail tampering
title_page: German police arrest man over high-speed rail tampering - BBC News
maintext: According to German news site Der Spiegel, the rails were five centimetres further apart than usual. This could have caused trains to derail and even send them plunging off the bridge.
